en.title: Lawyer for Foreigners in Alexandria â€“ Specialized Legal Services for Foreign Residents and Visitors
en.excerpt: Your comprehensive guide to specialized legal services for foreigners in Alexandria - residency, property, companies, marriage and divorce

content.text: Alexandria is one of the most important coastal cities in Egypt and a major destination for foreign residents and investors. With the increasing number of foreigners living or investing in the city, it has become essential to have a specialized lawyer for foreigners in Alexandria to ensure legal procedures are completed quickly and professionally.

In this article, we review the most prominent legal services provided by Lawyer Karim El-Dib for foreigners in Alexandria, focusing on the importance of a specialized lawyer to understand Egyptian laws and protect clients' rights.
Why Do You Need a Lawyer for Foreigners in Alexandria?
Foreigners residing in Egypt face specific laws related to:

items: Residency and renewal
Property purchase and sale
Company formation and investment projects
Mixed marriage and divorce
Contract and document certification
Legal procedures before government entities and courts

content.text: Having a specialized lawyer in foreign affairs ensures:

items: Avoiding costly legal mistakes
Fast completion of procedures
Protection of rights and property
Complete understanding of legal rights and obligations

content.text: Lawyer Karim El-Dib's Services for Foreigners in Alexandria
1. Company Formation for Foreigners â€“ Foreign Company Formation in Alexandria
The office provides company formation services of various types, with consultations on:

items: Foreign ownership percentages
Tax and legal procedures
Government certifications
Establishing investment and commercial companies

content.text: 2. Property Purchase and Sale for Foreigners â€“ Property Purchase for Foreigners
Purchasing property in Egypt for foreigners requires careful contract review and verification of ownership validity. The lawyer helps with:

items: Property registration at the Real Estate Registry
Protecting buyers from real estate fraud
Completing all legal procedures correctly
Reviewing and drafting real estate contracts

content.text: 3. Residency and Renewal â€“ Residency & Visa Services
Karim El-Dib's office provides comprehensive residency services, including:

items: Obtaining and renewing residency for foreigners
Egyptian spouse residency procedures for foreigners
Completing transactions at Passport and Immigration Authority
Monitoring residency status and annual renewal

content.text: 4. Marriage and Divorce for Foreigners â€“ Marriage & Divorce Services
The office assists with:

items: Mixed marriage documentation
Marriage or divorce registration for foreigners
Legal document translation and certification
Divorce procedures according to Egyptian law

content.text: 5. Immediate Legal Consultations â€“ Legal Consultation
The lawyer provides legal consultations in Arabic, English, French, German, and Italian to facilitate communication with different nationalities.
Why is Lawyer Karim El-Dib the Best Choice for Foreigners in Alexandria?

items: âœ” Extensive experience in laws specific to foreign residents
âœ” Speed and accuracy in completing legal procedures
âœ” Precise follow-up of every step and legal file management
âœ” High professionalism in client communication
âœ” Multilingual services serving various communities
âœ” Complete coverage in Alexandria and throughout Egypt

content.text: Contact the Lawyer for Foreigners in Alexandria
If you need a lawyer specialized in foreign affairs in Alexandria, you can contact Lawyer Karim El-Dib for immediate legal consultation and to complete all your procedures quickly and professionally.
âœ‰ï¸ Email: kingarim2411@gmail.com
